question: As i told all of you in my prevoius unanswerd post  i have been hypertensive for the past 10 yrs and was on atnolol a beta blocker and now dignose with diabets last week i have started taking metformin 500mg and pioglized 15these drug not only lowered my BP to 110/60 it always use to stay at 140/95 with constant feeling of palptition for the last 10yrs  which is dispersed totally i dont feel it even after exercise. i dont now what happend i googled it and found that inuling regsitan may cause hypertension. any thought on that ?
